title: Islands within islands within islands
creator_credit: Peter Firstbrook, Rodger Jones, Andrew Crilly, Open University and BBC-TV
brief_description: Studies the Hawaiian islands and the varied environments to be found there - eg deserts and frozen ash. Describes the formation of the islands and the ways in which plants may have migrated to newly formed volcanic islands. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Firstbrook, Rodger Jones, Andrew Crilly, Open University and BBC-TV
